item.title: US-395 North at CA-182
item.description: US-395 north at CA-182 in Bridgeport. Turn right for Bridgeport Reservoir and Yerington (Nevada).

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-182
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-182 north to Yerrington (Nevada). Turn left to continue north on US-395.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north. Distance to Bodie Road - Jct. CA-270, Bridgeport - Jct. CA-182, and Reno (Nevada).

item.title: US-395 South at CA-182
item.description: US-395 south at CA-182 in Bridgeport. When this picture was taken, US-395 was closed in the evenings north of Bridgeport, so northbound US-395 traffic had to use CA-182 to reach Reno and Carson City, hence the orange directional signs.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching CA-182
item.description: US-395 south approaching CA-182 north to Yerrington (Nevada).

item.title: US-395 South Approaching CA-182
item.description: US-395 South approaching CA-182 in Bridgeport.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-182
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-182 north to Yerrington (Nevada). Turn left to continue north on US-395.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north. Distance to Bodie Road - Jct. CA-270, Bridgeport - Jct. CA-182, and Reno (Nevada).
